price: It is He Who is God in the heaven and God on earth, and He is the All-Wise, the All-Knowing.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
